text: Roger Vergé (7 April 1930 – 5 June 2015) was a French chef and restaurateur. He is thought to be one of the greatest chefs of his time. The Gault Millau described him as "the very incarnation of the great French chef for foreigners". ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from diabetes Category:French chefs
title: Roger Vergé
